messages.title: Thatcham Toilets - Saved by the Lib Dems!
messages.content: Liberal Democrat run Thatcham Town Council has stepped in to ensure the Broadway toilets will stay open after Tory run West Berkshire Council had written to the Town Council saying that they would be closing them in September. The toilets have been a key facility at the Thatcham Apex since the mid 1990's and present block was fitted in the late 1990s and also provides access for radar-key cleaning equipment for the market traders.

messages.title: ONLY A VOTE FOR THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS CAN BEAT THE TORIES
messages.content: Liberal Democrats champion an economy that is strong, green, and fair. In government, the Lib Dems have explicitly blocked some of the Tories’ extreme policies, such as:

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Scrapping housing benefit for young people

mentions.tacticalSituation: On May 7th a vote for Labour is a wasted vote. Source: 2010 Newbury General Election Results - Labour can't win here.

issues.economy: Liberal Democrats champion an economy that is strong, green, and fair.
